title: Once upon a time in America (Captioned)
creator_credit: Embassy International Pictures, Arnon Milchan and Sergio Leone
brief_description: Crime, passion and a lust for power - an explosive saga of gangland America. Its extraordinary craftsmanship, together with its exceptional levels of acting and storytelling, place it among such other R-rated classics as “The Deerhunter”, “The Godfather”, “Midnight Express” and “A Clockwork Orange”. Stars Robert De Niro, James Woods and Elizabeth McGovern.
